words_with_descriptions.crag: A steep or rugged cliff or rock face.
words_with_descriptions.gulf: A large area of sea partially enclosed by land.
words_with_descriptions.brook: A small, natural stream of fresh water.
words_with_descriptions.mire: A stretch of swampy or boggy ground.
words_with_descriptions.glade: An open space in a forest.
words_with_descriptions.isle: A small island or peninsula, especially a scenic one.
words_with_descriptions.flora: The plants of a particular region, habitat, or geological period.
words_with_descriptions.haze: A slight obscuration of the lower atmosphere, typically caused by fine suspended particles.
words_with_descriptions.leaf: The flat, typically green part of a plant, attached to a stem.
